#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>

bool IsPrime(int num)
{
	if (num <= 1)
		return false;
	if (num == 2)
		return true;
	if (num % 2 == 0)
		return false;
	int sRoot = sqrt(num * 1.0);
	for (int i = 3; i <= sRoot; i += 2)
	{
		if (num % i == 0)
			return false;
	}
	return true;
}

bool SQ(long long N)
{
	double a = sqrt(N);
	int b = a;
	a = a - b;

	if (a == 0)
		return true;
	else
		return false;
}

int main()
{
	int T;
	long long N, num;
	bool x, y;
	double temp;

	scanf("%d", &T);

	while (T--)
	{
		scanf("%lld", &N);

		x = SQ(N);
		
		temp=log(N);
		temp=temp/2;
		
		num=exp(temp);
		
		while(num*num < N)
		num++;
		
		if(IsPrime(num))
		y=true;
		else y=false;
		
		if(x && y)
		printf("YES\n");
		else
		printf("NO\n");
	}
	
	return 0;
}
